Reference

All functions

app_run_EJAM()

Launch EJAM as shiny web app

app_server()

app_server - EJAM app server

app_ui()

app_ui - The application User-Interface

ask_number()

utility - interactive prompt in RStudio to ask user to specify number like radius

avg.in.us

avg.in.us (DATA) national averages of key indicators, for convenience

bgej

bgej (DATA) EJScreen EJ Indexes for Census block groups

bgpts

bgpts (DATA) lat lon of popwtd center of blockgroup, and count of blocks per block group

bg_cenpop2020

bg_cenpop2020 (DATA) data.table with all US Census 2020 block groups, Census 2020 population count, and lat/lon of Census2020-population-weighted centroid of block group

blockgroupstats

blockgroupstats (DATA) EJScreen demographic and environmental indicators for Census block groups

censusplaces

censusplaces (DATA) Census FIPS and other basic info on 41,414 cities/towns/places

colcounter_summary_all()

Summarize count (and percent) of rows with exactly (and at least) N cols >= various thresholds

counties_as_sites()

Analyze US Counties as if they were sites, to get EJ indicators summary for each county

count_sites_with_n_high_scores()

Answers questions like What % of sites have at least 1 demog. indicator >2x state avg?

dataload_from_local()

Load datasets from local disk folder

dataload_from_pins()

Utility to download / load datasets from pin board

datawrite_to_aws()

Utility NOT YET WORKING - AccessDenied

datawrite_to_local()

Save datasets during package development

distance_by_group()

distance_by_group - Avg distance of each demog group (of multiple groups) Same as plot_distance_mean_by_group() but no plot by default

distance_by_group1()

distance_by_group1 - JUST ONE GROUP Get average distance for ONE demographic group versus everyone else

distance_by_group_by_site()

distance_by_group_by_site - DRAFT FUNCTION

distance_by_group_plot()

distance_by_group_plot or plot_distance_cdf_by_group

distance_cdf_by_group_plot()

distance_cdf_by_group_plot - SLOW - needs to be optimized Plot a graphic showing cumulative shares of ONLY ONE demographic group that are within each distance

distance_mean_by_group()

distance_mean_by_group - Avg distance of each demog group (of multiple groups) Same as plot_distance_mean_by_group() but no plot by default

doaggregate()

Summarize environmental and demographic indicators at each location and overall

ejam2excel()

Save EJAM results in a spreadsheet

ejam2report()

View HTML Report on EJAM Results (Overall or at 1 Site)

ejamit()

Get an EJ analysis (demographic and environmental indicators) in or near a list of locations

ejampackages

ejampackages (DATA) list of names of key EJAM-related R packages

ejscreenit_for_ejam()

Get EJScreen results directly from EJScreen servers via their API

epa_programs

epa_programs (DATA) named vector with program counts

fips2countyname()

Get county names from county FIPS codes

fips2name()

Get county or state names from county or state FIPS codes

fips2statename()

Get state names from any type of FIPS codes

fips2state_abbrev()

Get state abbreviations from any type of FIPS codes

fips2state_fips()

Get state FIPS codes from any type of FIPS codes

fipstype()

Identify what type of Census geography is each FIPS code (block, county, etc.)

fips_bg_from_anyfips()

Get unique blockgroup fips in or containing specified fips of any type

fips_counties_from_statefips()

Get ALL county fips in specified states

fips_counties_from_statename()

Get ALL county fips in specified states

fips_counties_from_state_abbrev()

Get ALL county fips in specified states

fips_lead_zero()

Add leading zeroes to fips codes if missing, replace with NA if length invalid

fips_st2eparegion()

Get EPA Region number from state FIPS code

fips_state_from_statename()

Get state fips for each state name

fips_state_from_state_abbrev()

Get state fips for each state abbrev

frs

frs (DATA) EPA Facility Registry Service table of regulated sites

frsprogramcodes

frsprogramcodes DATA EPA programs listed in Facility Registry Service

frs_by_mact

frs_by_mact (DATA) MACT NESHAP subpart(s) that each EPA-regulated site is subject to

frs_by_naics

frs_by_naics (DATA) data.table of NAICS code(s) for each EPA-regulated site in Facility Registry Service

frs_by_programid

frs_by_programid (DATA) data.table of Program System ID code(s) for each EPA-regulated site in the Facility Registry Service

frs_by_sic

frs_by_sic (DATA) data.table of SIC code(s) for each EPA-regulated site in Facility Registry Service

frs_from_naics()

Use NAICS code or industry title text search to see FRS Facility Registry Service data on those EPA-regulated sites

frs_from_program()

Use EPA Program acronym like TRIS to see FRS Facility Registry Service data on those EPA-regulated sites

frs_from_programid()

Use EPA Program ID to see FRS Facility Registry Service data on those EPA-regulated sites

frs_from_regid()

Use registry ID to see FRS Facility Registry Service data on those EPA-regulated sites

frs_from_sic()

Use SIC code or industry title text search to see FRS Facility Registry Service data on those EPA-regulated sites

frs_from_sitename()

Use site name text search to see FRS Facility Registry Service data on those EPA-regulated sites

getblocksnearby()

Very fast way to distances to all nearby Census blocks

getblocksnearby_from_fips()

Find all blocks within each of the FIPS codes provided

getblocks_diagnostics()

utility - How many blocks and many other stats about blocks and sites

getfrsnearby()

DRAFTING A FUNCTION TO COUNT NEARBY SITES OF A CERTAIN TYPE

get_blockpoints_in_shape()

Find all Census blocks in a polygon, using internal point of block

high_pctiles_tied_with_min

high_pctiles_tied_with_min (DATA) internal data used to handle cases where multiple places are tied for the lowest indicator score

indexblocks()

Create localtree (a quadtree index of all US block centroids) in global environment

islandareas

islandareas (DATA) table, bounds info on lat lon of US Island Areas

latlon_from_anything()

latlon_from_anything - Flexibly get lat/lon from file, data.frame, data.table, or lat/lon vectors

latlon_from_mactsubpart()

Get point locations for US EPA-regulated facilities that have sources subject to Maximum Achievable Control Technology (MACT) standards under the Clean Air Act.

latlon_from_naics()

Find EPA-regulated facilities in FRS by NAICS code (industrial category)

latlon_from_program()

Get lat lon, Registry ID, and NAICS, for given FRS Program System CATEGORY Find all FRS sites in a program like RCRAINFO, TRIS, or others

latlon_from_programid()

Get lat lon, Registry ID, and NAICS, for given FRS Program System ID

latlon_from_regid()

Get lat lon (and NAICS) via Facility Registry ID

latlon_from_sic()

Find EPA-regulated facilities in FRS by SIC code (industrial category)

lat_alias lon_alias

lat_alias, lon_alias (DATA) Synonyms for lat and lon

lookup_pctile()

Find approx percentiles in lookup table that is in memory

mact_table

mact_table (DATA) MACT NESHAP subparts (the code and the description)

mapfastej_counties()

Static or HTML/leaflet map of counties

mapfast_gg()

mapfast_gg - A very simple ggplot2 map of points in the USA

map_blockgroups_over_blocks()

Overlay blockgroups near 1 site, after plotblocksnearby

map_facilities()

map_facilities

map_facilities_proxy()

map_facilities_proxy

map_shapes_leaflet()

Create a new leaflet map from shapefile data

map_shapes_leaflet_proxy()

update existing leaflet map by adding shapefile data

map_shapes_mapview()

Use mapview from the mapview package if available

map_shapes_plot()

Map drawn using base R plot()

NAICS

NAICS (DATA) named list of all NAICS code numbers and industry name for each

naics2children()

See NAICS codes queried plus all children of any of those

naicstable

naicstable (DATA) data.table of NAICS code(s) and industry names for each EPA-regulated site in Facility Registry Service Also has the 2,3,4,5,and 6-digit NAICS that this code falls under, where relevant for given length

naics_categories()

naics_categories - See the names of industrial categories and their NAICS code

naics_counts

naics_counts (DATA) data.frame with counts for each NAICS code, with and without subcodes, and labels that include the site counts

naics_findwebscrape()

for query term, show list of roughly matching NAICS, scraped from web

naics_from_any()

General way to search for industry names and NAICS codes

naics_subcodes_from_code()

find subcategories of the given overall NAICS industry code(s)

naics_url_of_code()

Get URL for page with info about industry sector(s) by NAICS

names_d

names_d (DATA) list of demographic indicator names

names_e

names_e (DATA) list of environmental indicator names

namez

namez (DATA) list of lists of indicator names (complete list in 1 object)

pctile_from_raw_lookup()

Find approx percentiles in lookup table that is in memory

plotblocksnearby()

plotblocksnearby - Map view of Census blocks (their centroids) near one or more sites Utility to quickly view one or more facility points on map with the blocks found nearby

plot_barplot_ratios()

Barplot of ratios of demographic (or other) scores to averages (or other references)

plot_demogshare_by_distance()

plot_demogshare_by_distance - work in progress

plot_distance_by_pctd()

plot_distance_by_pctd - Plot percent demographics within X miles of a site

plot_distance_cdf_by_group()

plot_distance_cdf_by_group - SLOW - needs to be optimized CDF Line Plots of cumulative share of each demographic group, within each distance Each groups distribution of distances

plot_distance_mean_by_group()

Barplot of Average Proximity, by Group

plot_lorenz_distance_by_dcount()

lorenz plot bybg_people (cumulative share of x vs cum share of y) - DRAFT/EXPERIMENTAL COUNT OF SITES (or PEOPLE?) BY BIN

plot_lorenz_popcount_by_site()

lorenz plot bysite (cumulative share of x vs cum share of y) - DRAFT/EXPERIMENTAL COMPARES TWO subsets OF SITES (or people??)

plot_ridgeline_ratios()

Make ridgeline plot of ratios of demographic score to its average

plot_vs_us()

draft code to plot distribution of a variable among residents near set of sites vs nationwide Not yet population weighted

popshare_at_top_n()

top N sites account for what percent of residents?

popshare_at_top_x_pct()

top X percent of sites account for what percent of residents?

popshare_p_lives_at_what_n()

how many sites account for P percent of residents?

popshare_p_lives_at_what_pct()

what percent of sites account for P percent of residents?

popup_from_any()

popup_from_any - Simple map popup from a data.table or data.frame, one point per row Creates popup vector that leaflet::addCircles or leaflet::addPopups can use. Works similarly to EJAMejscreenapi::popup_from_df, but now extends to data.table

proximity.score.in.miles()

proximity.score.in.miles - convert EJScreen proximity scores to miles per site instead of sites per kilometer Shows US percentiles if no arguments used

proxistat2()

Calculate a proximity score for every blockgroup - DRAFT WORK IN PROGRESS

quaddata

quaddata (DATA) data.table used to create index of all US block point locations

radius_inferred()

radius_inferred - utility to estimate original radius requested in getblocksnearby() if we only have the outputs of getblocksnearby()

regid_from_naics()

Find EPA-regulated facilities in FRS by NAICS code (industrial category)

regid_from_sic()

Find EPA-regulated facilities in FRS by SIC code (industrial category)

regionstats

regionstats (DATA) (obsolete) data.table of 100 percentiles and means for each EPA Region.

rmost()

utility to rm(list=ls()) but not remove key datasets EJAM uses

run_app()

run_app - Launch the Shiny Application in RStudio

shapefile_clean()

Drop invalid rows and warn if all invalid

shapefile_filepaths_from_folder()

Get list of valid filenames comprising shapefile including paths

shapefile_filepaths_valid()

Confirm files have all the extensions .shp, .shx, .dbf, and .prj

shapefile_from_filepaths()

Read shapefile from disk based on the filenames given

shapefile_from_folder()

Read shapefile from a folder

shapefile_from_sitepoints()

Convert table of lat,lon points/sites into sf:: shapefile

shapes_blockgroups_from_bgfips()

use API to get boundaries of blockgroups

shapes_counties_from_countyfips()

use API to get boundaries of US Counties to map them

shape_buffered_from_shapefile()

shape_buffered_from_shapefile - add buffer around shape

shape_buffered_from_shapefile_points()

shape_buffered_from_shapefile_points - add buffer around shape (points, here)

SIC

SIC (DATA) named list of all SIC code numbers and category name for each

sictable

sictable (DATA) data.table of SIC code(s) and industry names for each EPA-regulated site in Facility Registry Service Also has the 2,3, and 4-digit SIC that this code falls under, where relevant for given length

sic_categories()

See the names of SIC industrial categories and their codes

sic_from_any()

General way to search for industry names and NAICS codes

sic_from_code()

Search for industry names by SIC code(s), 4 digits each

sic_from_name()

Search for industry names and SIC codes by query string

sic_subcodes_from_code()

Find subcategories of the given overall SIC industry code(s)

test output of getblocksnearby(), and is an input to doaggregate()

sites2blocks_example100pts_1miles

test output of getblocksnearby(), and is an input to doaggregate()

sites2blocks_example10pts_1miles

test output of getblocksnearby(), and is an input to doaggregate()

speedtable_expand()

Utility used by speedtest() and speedtable_summarize()

speedtable_summarize()

utility used by speedtest()

speedtest_plot()

utility to plot output of speedtest(), rate of points analyzed per hour

stateinfo

stateinfo (DATA) data.frame of state abbreviations and state names (50+DC+PR; not AS, GU, MP, VI, UM)

stateinfo2

stateinfo2 (DATA) data.frame of state abbreviations and state names (50+DC+PR; not AS, GU, MP, VI, UM)

statestats

statestats (DATA) data.frame of 100 percentiles and means for each US State and PR and DC.

statestats_means()

statestats_means - convenient way to see STATE MEANS of ENVIRONMENTAL and DEMOGRAPHIC indicators

statestats_query()

statestats_query - convenient way to see mean, pctiles of Env or Demog indicators from lookup table

statestats_queryd()

statestats_queryd - convenient way to see mean, pctiles of DEMOG indicators from lookup table

statestats_querye()

statestats_querye - convenient way to see mean, pctiles of ENVIRONMENTAL indicators from lookup table

states_as_sites()

Analyze US States as if they were sites, to get EJ indicators summary

states_infer()

states_infer - Get table of info on States (from latlon or FIPS)

states_shapefile

states_shapefile (DATA) US States boundaries 2020 shapefile from TIGER

state_from_latlon()

Find what state is where each point is located

ST_by_site_from_sites2blocks()

Get State that each site is in, from a table of ejam_uniq_id, blockid, distance

table4gt_from_scorevectors()

DRAFT EXPERIMENTAL - attempt to make table more flexible / any indicators

tablefixed()

Table of counts of integer values zero through maxbin

table_gt_format_step1()

Validate and reshape 1 row of ejamit results to prep for formatting as gt table/report

table_gt_format_step2()

Format a table of demog or envt scores, percentiles, etc. to look similar to EJScreen report tables

table_gt_from_ejamit_1site()

table_gt_from_ejamit_overall()

table_order_variables()

table_rounding_info()

table_validated_ejamit_row()
